Content: Hey team! I’ve just completed the first draft of our project proposal. Please review it and leave your feedback. I think we should also discuss the timeline for the next sprint.
I’ve added some additional references to the literature review section based on the professor’s feedback. Let me know if you think we should expand more on the methodology part.
Great job everyone on the presentation! I think we nailed it. I’ve attached the slides here in case anyone wants to make final adjustments before submission.
Here’s the meeting summary from today. We agreed to focus on improving the UI for our prototype and also refining the user flow based on the feedback we received.
Hey all, due to the upcoming deadline, I think we should split the remaining tasks among us. Please check the document I shared and assign yourself to one of the pending tasks.
Just uploaded the latest version of the backend API documentation. Please review it before the next integration phase. Let me know if you find any inconsistencies.
Hi team, I’ve updated the project’s README file to include setup instructions and a troubleshooting section. It should be easier for everyone to get started now.
Reminder: We have a client meeting scheduled for Friday. Please make sure your parts of the demo are ready. Let’s do a dry run on Thursday evening to make sure everything works smoothly.
I’ve attached the testing report from QA. There are still a few critical bugs to fix before we can move to production. Let’s prioritize these during the next sprint.
Hey, check out the new dashboard design concept I worked on over the weekend. I’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions before we finalize it.
